content: this pattern is available in english us crochet terms size 7 7 cm 3 3 in if using sport weight yarn sport 12 wpi 2 fine skill level beginner material yarn yarnart jeans blue and yellow 55% cotton / 45% acrylic hook 2 25 mm b soft stuffing scissors pins for sewing parts at the right spot needle for sewing pattern exists only in electronic form by purchasing this pattern you agree to the terms of use 1 this pattern is for personal use only 2 it is prohibited to reproduce copy publish or distribute this pattern its parts or photos in any way or form including translations into foreign languages 3 it is allowed to publish photos of the finished items sell the finished items indicating the pattern s author tatiana kucherovska tanaticrochet thank you for coming by
